data.message: Facebook I want the chronological order feed back on my mobile how do I do it ?

replies.message: Hi Guglielmo. To select the Most Recent News Feed please click the More button (three lines on the top right), scroll down to the Feeds section and select Most Recent. -Sarah

Sure but that is not the old chronological feed that I want back right? I don't understand why your algorithm has to be apply anyway. I really want to know how to see all the people friends posts in chronological order without having your algorithm chopping off most of them please.
It's my problem if I get flooded by 1000 posts a day
